name: Mini Digger
description:
MINI DIGGER invites you to be the boss of the DiggyAntique company. Here you can lean back in a comfortable boss's chair, grow your mining business and become the idle rich!

Recruit your workers and start digging! Excavate and uncover astonishing heritage sites, antiques, treasures, etc. Sell gold and diamond ore, polish your digging skills, invest like a business tycoon and hire more workers to speed up! Collect cultural relics from ancient times! Enjoy the beautiful and fascinating scenes of the historical remains!

Start digging in one of the addicting incremental/clicker game! Can’t wait to start? Tap to Dig!

HOW TO PLAY
• Recruit your miners and start digging!
• Profit from selling your gold and diamond ore at the right time, and upgrade your digging tools to dig faster
• Find lazy workers and tap to wake them up
• Explore iconic maps with archaeological themes: Easter Island, Egyptian Pyramids, and more!
• Uncover the mysterious history behind relics and historical remains

KEY FEATURES
• Super-duper satisfying game! Casual gameplay! Perfect time killer!
• Beautiful and refreshing animations and low-poly 3D graphics
• Three well-designed thematic maps waiting for you to explore
• Automatic digging and mining
• Get idle gold coins, even when you are sleeping!
• Lots of gifts: daily rewards, lucky wheel, and more! Get some free stuff every day!

Mini Digger introduces you to an intriguing way to spend your free time with pleasure, relax your mind and learn background stories about ancient treasures. The delightful simulation idle mining game is definitely worth a try! All it takes for your mining journey to unfold is you!
